resources.string:
Breakfast: 
 Granola 75g 
 Greek Yogurt 100g 
 chopped Brazil Nuts 
 + 1 handful each of Blueberries and Raspberries 28g 
 
 Morning Snack: 
 2 Oatcakes 
 1 tablespoon Peanut Butter 
 1 Nectarine 
 
 Lunch: 
 2 Whole Wheat Pita Breads 
 Roast Chicken 100g 
 1 medium Avocado 
 Large handful of Spinach, Watercress and Rocket 
 
 Afternoon Snack: 
 Trail Mix 50g 
 
 Dinner: 
 Salmon Fillet 140g 
 Brown Basmati Rice 100g 
 Tahini Broccoli 85g 
 Green Peas 80g 
 
 Evening Snack: 
 Medium Banana

Breakfast: 
 1 grapefruit 
 2 poached eggs 
 2 slices whole-grain toast 
 cup low-fat milk 
 cup of black coffee 
 Snack: 
 1 banana 
 1 cup plain yogurt 
 glass of water 
 Lunch: 
 chicken breast 
 large garden salad with tomato and onion with one cup croutons, topped with one tablespoon oil and vinegar 
 glass of water 
 
 Dinner: 
 1 cup steamed broccoli 
 1 cup of brown rice 
 halibut 
 small garden salad with one cup spinach leaves, tomato, and onion topped with two tablespoons oil and vinegar or salad dressing 1 glass white wine sparkling water with lemon or lime slice 
 
 Snack: 
 1 cup blueberries 2 tablespoons whipped cream glass of water

Breakfast: 
 1/2 cup egg whites scrambled with 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon chopped basil, 1 teaspoon grated Parmesan, and 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes 
 1 slice whole-grain toast 
 1/2 cup blueberries 
 1 cup skim milk 
 
 Snack: 
 1/2 cup fat-free Greek yogurt topped with 1/4 cup sliced strawberries 
 
 Lunch: 
 Salad made with: 3/4 cup cooked bulgur, 4 ounces chopped grilled chicken breast, 1 tablespoon shredded low-fat cheddar, diced grilled veggies 
 2 tablespoons hummus and 6 baby carrots 
 
 Dinner: 
 4 ounces grilled salmon 
 1 cup wild rice with 1 tablespoon slivered toasted almonds 
 1 cup wilted baby spinach with 1 teaspoon each olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and grated Parmesan 
 1/2 cup diced cantaloupe topped with 1/2 cup all-fruit raspberry sorbet and 1 teaspoon chopped walnuts
